name: Replanting
description:
In trying to create something out of generating branching mazes, I stumbled upon this idea, which yielded puzzles that can be surprisingly difficult to figure out (only sometimes though, you have to get lucky). Solving a puzzle is about figuring out how it was generated and untangling the paths until you arrive back at your starting point. After the first three levels, all of the puzzles are generated on the spot. 

I have other larger projects on the way, but I figured that this is worth sharing, especially because you can check out how the random generation works yourself at the linked below. 

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys/WASD: Move
  • Spacebar or X: Select menu options
  • Z: Undo
  • R: Reset

Source Code:

https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=55ccceea0d1654f0cffc016d2d28ff83
